body.p: This section describes how to install the Linux version of .
Log in to the target Server as an admin user and follow the steps below:

ol.li: Create a new folder if necessary, eg /opt/miramo: mkdir -p /opt/miramo
Change directory to the new folder: cd /opt/miramo
Extract files from the downloaded distribution package, for example:tar -xzof /tmp/MiramoPDF-DBD-2.0.0pNNN.tar.gz to create /opt/miramo/MiramoPDF-2.0.0pNNN - this is the Miramo installation folder.
Change directory to the installation folder, eg: cd /opt/miramo/MiramoPDF-2.0.0pNNN

body.p:
The install.sh script runs the ’installComposer.sh’ script which does the following:
installs the fontconfig prerequisite, if necessary.
makes a link from /usr/local/bin/miramo and /usr/local/bin/miramo- to the runComposer.sh wrapper script located in the installation folder, so the miramo and miramo- commands (composition engine) are automatically available to all users.

If you wish to install multiple concurrent versions of the composition engine, and are publishing using the , the location of the runMmComposer.sh script may be configured using the miramopath ant build parameter. To read more about ant build parameters see and
